info.name: Pokémon Showdown Skin
info.description:
A skin for Pokémon Showdown. Now works with Firefox!
Preview image: http://i.imgur.com/ieoNAOF.png
info.additionalInfo:
Created by Spherical Ice, with help from Ridaz, Scotteh and the creator(s) of this skin: https://userstyles.org/styles/101626/kalos-theme-x-y-style-pokemon-showdown.

Works best with this:
https://userstyles.org/styles/116500/pokemon-showdown-client-ui-reverser

Select, from top to bottom, "Old", "Old", "PS Default"***, "Old" and "None". 

*** highly recommended

data.title: Fixing HP Bar and Teambuilder Sprite
